title: For the Cyclist Who Has Everything? Therabody’s Super-Tech Recovery Tools Go Beyond Marginal Gains
content:
Therabody's JetBoots Prime and Theragun Prime Plus are gifts even Pogačar would be pleased with. But are these best-in-class devices worth the devastating price?

Read the full article at For the Cyclist Who Has Everything? Therabody’s Super-Tech Recovery Tools Go Beyond Marginal Gains on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
